english.segment1: (Chorus). Take me back, take me back dear Lord. To the place where I first believed you. Take me back, take me back dear Lord where I. first believe.
english.segment2: (Verse). I feel that I'm so far from you Lord. But still I hear you calling me. Those simple things that I once knew, The memories are drawing me. I must confess, Lord I've been blessed. But yet my soul's not satisfied. Renew my faith, restore my joy. And dry my weaping eyes.
english.segment4: (Bridge). I tried so hard. To make it all alone. I need your help. Just to make it home.
